member.name: M:MonoDevelop.Platform.IOleWindow.GetWindow(System.IntPtr@)
member.summary: Returns the window handle to one of the windows participating in in-place activation (frame, document, parent, or in-place object window).
member.param: Pointer to where to return the window handle.

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.Platform.IOleWindow.ContextSensitiveHelp(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Determines whether context-sensitive help mode should be entered during an in-place activation session.
member.param: true if help mode should be entered; false if it should be exited.

member.name: F:MonoDevelop.Platform.Windows.Native.CredentialsUiWindowsFlags.Generic
member.summary: The caller is requesting that the credential provider return the user name and password in plain text. This value cannot be combined with SECURE_PROMPT.

member.name: F:MonoDevelop.Platform.Windows.Native.CredentialsUiWindowsFlags.Checkbox
member.summary: The Save check box is displayed in the dialog box.

member.name: F:MonoDevelop.Platform.Windows.Native.CredentialsUiWindowsFlags.AuthenticationPackageOnly
member.summary: Only credential providers that support the authentication package specified by the authPackage parameter should be enumerated. This value cannot be combined with InputCredentialsOnly.

member.name: F:MonoDevelop.Platform.Windows.Native.CredentialsUiWindowsFlags.InputCredentialsOnly
member.summary: Only the credentials specified by the InAuthBuffer parameter for the authentication package specified by the authPackage parameter should be enumerated. If this flag is set, and the InAuthBuffer parameter is NULL, the function fails. This value cannot be combined with AuthenticationPackageOnly.

member.name: F:MonoDevelop.Platform.Windows.Native.CredentialsUiWindowsFlags.EnumerateOnlyAdministrators
member.summary: Credential providers should enumerate only administrators. This value is intended for User Account Control (UAC) purposes only. We recommend that external callers not set this flag.

member.name: F:MonoDevelop.Platform.Windows.Native.CredentialsUiWindowsFlags.EnumerateOnlyCurrentUser
member.summary: Only the incoming credentials for the authentication package specified by the authPackage parameter should be enumerated.

member.name: F:MonoDevelop.Platform.Windows.Native.CredentialsUiWindowsFlags.ShowOnSecureDesktop
member.summary: The credential dialog box should be displayed on the secure desktop. This value cannot be combined with Generic. Windows Vista: This value is not supported until Windows Vista with SP1.

member.name: F:MonoDevelop.Platform.Windows.Native.CredentialsUiWindowsFlags.ShouldPackTo32BitBoundary
member.summary: The credential provider should align the credential BLOB pointed to by the refOutAuthBuffer parameter to a 32-bit boundary, even if the provider is running on a 64-bit system.

member.name: M:MonoDevelop.Platform.Windows.NativeCredential.GetNativeCredential(MonoDevelop.Platform.Windows.Credential)
member.summary: This method derives a NativeCredential instance from a given Credential instance.
member.param: The managed Credential counterpart containing data to be stored.
member.returns: A NativeCredential instance that is derived from the given Credential instance.
